3 namespace Ubiquity\utils\http;

14 class UResponse {
15  public static $headers = [ ];
16 
29  public static function header($headerField, $value, $replace = null, $responseCode = null) {
30  self::$headers [trim ( $headerField )] = trim ( $value );
31  \header ( trim ( $headerField ) . ": " . trim ( $value ), $replace, $responseCode );
32  }
33 
39  private static function _headerArray($headerField, $values) {
40  if (\is_array ( $values )) {
41  $values = \implode ( ", ", $values );
42  }
43  self::header ( $headerField, $values );
44  }
45 
52  public static function setContentType($contentType, $encoding = null) {
53  $value = $contentType;
54  if (isset ( $encoding ))
55  $value .= ' ;' . $encoding;
56  self::header ( 'content-type', $value );
57  }
58 
62  public static function noCache() {
63  self::header ( 'Cache-Control', 'no-cache, must-revalidate' );
64  self::header ( 'Expires', 'Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT' );
65  }
66 
76  public static function isSent(&$file = null, &$line = null) {
77  return \headers_sent ( $file, $line );
78  }
79 
83  public static function asJSON() {
84  self::header ( 'Content-Type', 'application/json' );
85  }
86 
93  public static function isJSON() {
94  return isset ( self::$headers ["Content-Type"] ) && self::$headers ["Content-Type"] === 'application/json';
95  }
96 
103  public static function asHtml($encoding = 'utf-8') {
104  self::setContentType ( 'text/html', $encoding );
105  }
106 
113  public static function asXml($encoding = 'utf-8') {
114  self::setContentType ( 'application/xml', $encoding );
115  }
116 
123  public static function asText($encoding = 'utf-8') {
124  self::setContentType ( 'plain/text', $encoding );

134  public static function setAccept($value) {
135  self::header ( 'Accept', $value );

137 
149  public static function enableCors($origin = '*', $methods = 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS', $headers = 'X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Origin, Authorization') {
150  self::setAccessControlOrigin ( $origin );
151  self::setAccessControlMethods ( $methods );
152  self::setAccessControlHeaders ( $headers );
153  }
154 
161  public static function setAccessControlOrigin($origin = '*') {
162  self::header ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin', $origin );
163  if ($origin !== '*') {
164  self::header ( 'Vary', 'Origin' );
165  }
166  }
167 
173  public static function setAccessControlMethods($methods) {
174  self::_headerArray ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods', $methods );
175  }
176 
182  public static function setAccessControlHeaders($headers) {
183  self::_headerArray ( 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $headers );
184  }
185 
191  public static function setAuthorization($authorization) {
192  self::header ( 'Authorization', $authorization );
193  }
194 
200  public static function setResponseCode($value) {
201  \http_response_code ( $value );
202  }
203 
209  public static function getResponseCode() {
210  return \http_response_code ();
211  }
212 }
